author: Hemant Mehta
title: God Gives the Worst Gifts
text:
A Fake Psychic Was Punished for Posing As a “Real” Psychic » About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
